message.content: {"steps":[{"output":"[KR]","explanation":"한국어로 풀이를 시작합니다."},{"output":"Step 1 [조건 (가)의 확률 계산]:","explanation":"7번 중 3번 이상 앞면이 나올 확률을 계산합니다. 이는 2번 이하로 앞면이 나올 확률을 1에서 뺀 값입니다."},{"output":"- $P(\\text{3개 이상}) = 1 - P(\\text{2개 이하})$","explanation":"3번 이상 앞면이 나올 확률은 2번 이하로 나올 확률의 여사건입니다."},{"output":"- $P(\\text{2개 이하}) = \\binom{7}{0}\\left(\\frac{1}{2}\\right)^7 + \\binom{7}{1}\\left(\\frac{1}{2}\\right)^7 + \\binom{7}{2}\\left(\\frac{1}{2}\\right)^7$","explanation":"2번 이하로 앞면이 나올 확률을 계산합니다."},{"output":"- $= \\frac{1}{128} + \\frac{7}{128} + \\frac{21}{128} = \\frac{29}{128}$","explanation":"각 경우의 확률을 더하여 2번 이하로 나올 확률을 구합니다."},{"output":"- 따라서, $P(\\text{3개 이상}) = 1 - \\frac{29}{128} = \\frac{99}{128}$","explanation":"3번 이상 앞면이 나올 확률을 구합니다."},{"output":"Step 2 [조건 (나)의 확률 계산]:","explanation":"연속해서 앞면이 나오지 않을 확률을 계산하고, 이를 통해 연속해서 앞면이 나올 확률을 구합니다."},{"output":"- 연속해서 앞면이 나오지 않을 확률 = \\frac{1}{2^6} + \\frac{1}{2^6} = \\frac{1}{32}$","explanation":"연속해서 앞면이 나오지 않는 경우는 두 가지 경우로 나뉩니다."},{"output":"- 따라서, 연속해서 앞면이 나올 확률 = 1 - \\frac{1}{32} = \\frac{31}{32}$","explanation":"연속해서 앞면이 나올 확률을 구합니다."},{"output":"Step 3 [두 조건을 모두 만족할 확률]:","explanation":"조건 (가)와 (나)를 모두 만족할 확률을 계산합니다."},{"output":"- $P(\\text{가 and 나}) = P(\\text{가}) + P(\\text{나}) - P(\\text{가 or 나})$","explanation":"두 조건을 모두 만족할 확률은 각각의 확률의 합에서 둘 중 하나라도 만족하는 확률을 뺀 값입니다."},{"output":"- $= \\frac{99}{128} + \\frac{31}{32} - 1 = \\frac{99}{128} + \\frac{62}{64} - 1$","explanation":"각 확률을 대입하여 계산합니다."},{"output":"- $= \\frac{198}{256} + \\frac{248}{256} - \\frac{256}{256} = \\frac{190}{256} = \\frac{95}{128} = \\frac{23}{32}$","explanation":"계산을 통해 최종 확률을 구합니다."},{"output":"Answer: \\(\\MC: boxed{2}\\)","explanation":"최종 답을 선택합니다."},{"output":"[EN]","explanation":"Now, let's provide the solution in English."},{"output":"Step 1 [Calculate the probability for condition (a)]:","explanation":"Calculate the probability of getting heads 3 or more times out of 7 coin tosses."},{"output":"- $P(\\text{3 or more}) = 1 - P(\\text{2 or less})$","explanation":"The probability of getting heads 3 or more times is the complement of getting heads 2 or less times."},{"output":"- $P(\\text{2 or less}) = \\binom{7}{0}\\left(\\frac{1}{2}\\right)^7 + \\binom{7}{1}\\left(\\frac{1}{2}\\right)^7 + \\binom{7}{2}\\left(\\frac{1}{2}\\right)^7$","explanation":"Calculate the probability of getting heads 2 or less times."},{"output":"- $= \\frac{1}{128} + \\frac{7}{128} + \\frac{21}{128} = \\frac{29}{128}$","explanation":"Sum the probabilities for each case to find the probability of getting heads 2 or less times."},{"output":"- Therefore, $P(\\text{3 or more}) = 1 - \\frac{29}{128} = \\frac{99}{128}$","explanation":"Calculate the probability of getting heads 3 or more times."},{"output":"Step 2 [Calculate the probability for condition (b)]:","explanation":"Calculate the probability of having consecutive heads."},{"output":"- Probability of no consecutive heads = \\frac{1}{2^6} + \\frac{1}{2^6} = \\frac{1}{32}$","explanation":"There are two cases where no consecutive heads occur."},{"output":"- Therefore, probability of consecutive heads = 1 - \\frac{1}{32} = \\frac{31}{32}$","explanation":"Calculate the probability of having consecutive heads."},{"output":"Step 3 [Calculate the probability of satisfying both conditions]:","explanation":"Calculate the probability of satisfying both conditions (a) and (b)."},{"output":"- $P(\\text{a and b}) = P(\\text{a}) + P(\\text{b}) - P(\\text{a or b})$","explanation":"The probability of satisfying both conditions is the sum of individual probabilities minus the probability of satisfying at least one condition."},{"output":"- $= \\frac{99}{128} + \\frac{31}{32} - 1 = \\frac{99}{128} + \\frac{62}{64} - 1$","explanation":"Substitute the probabilities into the formula."},{"output":"- $= \\frac{198}{256} + \\frac{248}{256} - \\frac{256}{256} = \\frac{190}{256} = \\frac{95}{128} = \\frac{23}{32}$","explanation":"Perform the calculations to find the final probability."},{"output":"Answer: \\(\\MC: boxed{2}\\)","explanation":"Select the final answer."}],"final_answer":"\\MC: boxed{2}"}
